title: Alpha client download help pls
body: After i reinstalled my game i canceled the alpha client instalation (5 or 6 days ago) and now it doesnt work when i click that icon on old client that shows upgrade to Alpha, how can i download it?

replies.body:
The option should be available through the legacy client.  If you cancelled the installation, there is a chance some files corrupted and might require a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).  See if you can get back to the client manually, and then select the updated version from there:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=w8HeMOPB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-12T19:47:58.381+0000)

> The option should be available through the legacy client.  If you cancelled the installation, there is a chance some files corrupted and might require a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).  See if you can get back to the client manually, and then select the updated version from there:
> 
> -  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
> -  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"
> 
> Let me know!

it was giving me an error every time i was oppening the new client, fixed now. thanks, apreciatte it c:
